name: Spider-Man 2: The Sinister Six
description: Spider-Man 2: The Sinister Six (or Spider-Man 2: Enter the Sinister Six in Europe) is a video game for the Game Boy Color developed by Torus Games, published by Activision, and released on May 30, 2001. It was a sequel to the first game released for the Game Boy Color simply titled Spider-Man, and had a similar format.
